short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-Powered Resume Editor, formatter, and instant PDF Exporter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Resume Buddy: AI-Powered Resume Enhancement

Automatically analyze job descriptions and optimize your resume using AI technology. This tool helps you:
- Identify key requirements from job postings
- Get AI-powered suggestions for resume improvements
- Generate tailored resumes for specific positions
- Seamlessly integrate with LinkedIn job postings
- Instant export to multiple formats (Currently supported: PDF)

Perfect for job seekers looking to improve their application success rate and save time in the job search process.
